org.atmosphere.samples.chat

Class WebSocketChat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.atmosphere.websocket.WebSocketHandlerAdapter
      • org.atmosphere.samples.chat.WebSocketChat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebSocketHandler

    @WebSocketHandlerService(path="/chat",
                         broadcaster=SimpleBroadcaster.class)
public class WebSocketChat
extends WebSocketHandlerAdapter
    Simple WebSocketHandler that implement the logic to build a Chat application.
    Author:
    Jeanfrancois Arcand
